Issue.creator: sudeshrshetty
Issue.summary: SDK Go : suppress repetitive config WARNs
Issue.description: WARN Getting orderers from endpoint config channels.orderer is deprecated, use entity matchers to override orderer configuration fabsdk/fab 2018/05/15 17:46:37 UTC - channel.orderersFromChannelCfg -> WARN visit https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-go/blob/master/test/fixtures/config/overrides/local_entity_matchers.yaml for samples move it to initialization of endpoint config where NetworkConfig is being called the first time. >
